sent.orig: So we sing the song again!
Your eyes close and open again and again, I die again and again.
sent.trans: 哈哈，不禁有些佩服自己了，居然用这么简单的单词表达了这么深邃的意思。

sent.orig: Your eye close and open again and again I die again and again.
sent.trans: 你的眼睛贬啊贬，我就死来活来？

sent.orig: Again the pack of Camels, again the lighter, again touching his hand, lightly.
sent.trans: 又是那包骆驼牌，又是那打火机，又是轻轻碰了一下手。

sent.orig: A day, host burnishs stone again and again abluent, want again drive up its value.
sent.trans: 一天，主人把石头一再磨光洗净，想再次抬高它的价值。
